name: You are a magic sword
description:
You are a magic sword, sleeping in your scabbard.
Remember the hands that last wielded you, how they felt around you.
Do you know why you were drawn?
Do you know why you were sheathed?
What do you hope will be true about the hands that wield you next?

The text above is the entirety of this business card-sized game. Play it solo or with friends to build a small world around the hopes and memories of an enchanted blade. What dreams do you have, sword, in your scabbard-bound sleep?
